title: The Power of Love
description: Leela was a lonely girl with a secret she was afraid to tell, and no real family or friends left to tell it to. Clay was a high paid programmer missing something from his life, until he found Leela. No matter her secret, no matter the odds, he was bound and determined to prove to this lonely young beauty that she was worthy of his love. Together these two lovers would discover the power of love.
author: Jenny Leigh Jones
